content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (15.5,70.5) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest at (15.5,72.5) storing iron ore (currently contains 15 iron ore)

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5,70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5,70.5) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore (currently contains 16 copper ore)

### Power Generation System at (-9.5,-0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,-0.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-5.0,-0.5) converting water to steam (currently has coal fuel)
- Steam engine at (-0.5,-0.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting the components (currently not fully functional)

### Iron Smelting Operation at (16.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (16.0,71.0) extracting iron ore (fueled with coal, output blocked)
- Stone furnace at (17.0,73.0) smelting iron plates (working with coal fuel but no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at (18.5,72.5) storing output (empty)
- Wooden chest at (16.5,72.5) storing iron ore (contains 2 iron ore)

### Copper Mining Operation at (-46.0,71.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-46.0,71.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-46.5,72.5) storing copper ore

### Smelting Setups
- Stone furnace at (100.0,100.0) with wooden chest at (98.5,100.5) (no ingredients)
- Stone furnace at (300.0,300.0) with wooden chest at (298.5,300.5) (no ingredients)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Placement Issues
- Repeated failed attempts to place burner inserters at (17.5,72.5) and (17.5,73.5) (steps 104-114)
- Failed wooden chest placement at (17.5,72.5) and (17.5,73.5) (steps 111,115)
- Failed burner mining drill placement at (50.0,50.0) due to terrain (step 119)
- Always verify target position is clear before placing entities
- Check terrain suitability before placement attempts
- Consider alternative positions or remove blocking objects first

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Furnaces remain without ingredients (steps 106-119)
- Burner mining drill output still blocked (steps 107-119)
- Ensure proper material flow from mining to smelting operations
- Verify inserter placement and orientation for furnace input/output

### Entity Inspection Errors
- Repeated attempts to inspect non-existent chest at (18.5,72.5) (steps 112-117)
- Verify entity existence before attempting inspection
- Handle missing entities gracefully in code

### Insertion Failures
- Failed to insert iron ore due to missing recipient (step 118)
- Ensure target entity exists and can accept items before insertion

### Existing Issues from Previous Report
- Power system still not fully functional
- Continue addressing these persistent issues

### System Design Best Practices
- Maintain proper spacing between components
- Verify all connections before testing systems
- Plan material flow paths before placement
- Consider using electric inserters instead of burner inserters for reliability
